hero.title: Creator of <1>Digital Solutions</1>
hero.description: Transforming complex ideas into high-performance code. Experts in building scalable architectures and immersive interfaces.

about.title: Hello, I'm Douglas Maia!
about.content: I'm a <1>Full Stack</1> developer passionate about transforming lines of code into real solutions. With solid experience in <2>web development</2>, my mission is to create architectures that are not only functional, but also scalable and elegant. My career path spans from complex enterprise applications to process automation, always with an obsessive focus on <3>performance</3> and user experience.

founder.description: Software house focused on technical excellence and innovation.

projects.title: Selected <1>Projects</1>
projects.description: A collection of solved technical challenges, ranging from open-source applications to high-level enterprise systems.

items.pulseGuard: Status page for real-time service monitoring, with incident history and availability metrics. Focused on performance, transparency, and rapid fault detection.
items.wilo: A platform for campaign automation and management powered by artificial intelligence, offering organization, productivity, and real-time insights.
items.forge: CRM with native WhatsApp integration, centralizing leads, conversations, and sales routines in a single, fast, and scalable system.

contact.title: Let's build something <1/> <2>amazing together!</2>
contact.description: I'm always open to new challenges and partnerships. Choose your preferred channel and send a <1>"Hello"</1>.

items.whatsapp: Can we chat for a second?
